EmailTemplate.description: Email template notifying the assesment has been completed.
EmailTemplate.name: Assesment Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: Done!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {!User.Name}! Before anything, I would like to apologize for the extreme delay in the submission of the assessment. To be totally honest when I finished it, I forgot to do the final steps. The assessment was completed on Saturday the 10th. It took me around 35-40 hours. The url for the GIT repository is here. Kind regards, Carlos Alvarado
